CHAT.comment: Time is 16:49. Magnets are set up on a table; Mot and Chi are seated across from one another at the table; black base is full of objects; at the outset of the activity Mot has the horseshoe magnet and Chi has the yellow wand

MOT and Chi work well together; Chi primarily plays with the objects; Mot joins in occasionally and gives suggestions which Chi follows; science talk is limited to a few isolated exchanges about whether or not particular items stick

u.a: points to black base
offers horseshoe magnet to Chi
holds yellow wand over a silver man on the black base; it causes the silver man to stand up on the base
holds yellow wand over black base again; yellow wand sticks to base
moves yellow wand over black base again; a silver stick sticks to the wand
stands two silver men on top of one another on the black base
pulls a silver man off the yellow wand and puts it on top of the two silver men on the black base
the stack of three silver men falls over
stands the three silver men back up on top of one another on the black base
picks up a silver stick and tries to stick it to the construction; it falls

g.ga: silver man at top of construction

u.a: attempts to place the plastic teddy bear on top of the construction; it falls
picks up yellow wand and taps plastic teddy bear with it
picks up plastic turtle in one hand and holds the yellow wand over it with the other
successfully attemtps to place a magnet ball on top of a washer that the silver man at the top of the construction is holding
adds a nut to the top of the construction
holds horseshoe magnet over the nut at the top of the construction
MOT has pulled the construction apart with the horseshoe magnet
puts the quarter on top of the yellow wand; it slips off the yellow wand
taps the quarter with the yellow wand
yellow wand has picked up a washer and two nuts that were nearby the quarter
clears off washer and two nuts from the yellow wand
points to a silver man on the table
picks up silver man from table
attempts to place silver man on top of the other silver men on the black base; then attempts to add a nut which causes all the men to fall
holds out yellow wand with some objects stuck to it
is probably comparing the strength of the yellow wand to the strength of the horseshoe magnet that Chi is holding
takes yellow wand from Mot and clears off objects
attempts to place a silver man on top of two others on the black base; then attempts to add a nut to the top
under her breath
muttered
muttered
is referring to washers that Mot has added to the construction which are stacked to look like steps
washer that she is trying to place on construction
mumbled
reaches to move washers and they fall; the rest of the construction also falls
attempts to balence silver man on top of two others on the black base
begins to clear some of the objects off the black base
points to black base
phone rings
pulls silver men off black base
MOT answers phone , talks very briefly , and hangs up
has made a pyramid construction on the black base with the silver men
moves silver stick toward Chi's construction
holds the silver stick to one silver man on the construction; he moves slightly; sticks silver stick to the silver man
holds a magnet ball over the silver stick as if she is going to place it there
takes magnet ball away
attempts to stick second silver stick to the construction; it falls
whispered
moves silver stick toward construction again
pulls objects off black base
stands a paper clip on the silver circle on the black base
attempts to stand a paper clip up on the black base
paper clip
paper clip
holds yellow wand over the paper clip on the black base and moves it so that the paper clip waves on the base

g.ga: use wand to make paper clips move

u.a: successfully stands a paper clip on the black base
takes the yellow wand and waves it over the paper clip
attempts to stand more than one paper clip up on the base
attempts to get more than one paper clip to stand on the black base
mumbled
picks up yellow wand and holds it over the paper clip on the black base
pulls the paper clip off the black base; uses the yellow wand to pull a silver ball off the black base
waves yellow wand over black base
stands paper clip back up on base
yellow wand has picked up the paper clip that Mot put back on the black base
pulls paper clip off yellow wand
pulls objects off the black base
pulls off the paper clip and then the red magnet ball
puts silver ball in the center of silver circle and then sticks the yellow wand on top of it and holds it there
sings
holds yellow wand above silver ball and uses it to move the silver ball around the edge of the silver circle
sings
silver ball
silver ball
repeats action with the yellow wand
takes silver ball off black base and sticks yellow wand to the base
puts yellow wand down and picks up the black base; moves it over objects on the table so that they stick to the bottom of the black base

g.ga: string of objects hanging from base

u.a: moves black base with dangling objects over a magnet ball on the table until it sticks to the end of the chain of objects
turns base over in hand and begins to pick up other objects from table with her hand and put the onto the base
puts quarter on the base
the quarter slides off the base
moves yellow wand with some objects stuck to it over the black base in Chi's hand
clears objects off the black base
last five words of utterence are sing song
attempts to place nut on top of the other nut
takes nut away
picks up a paper clip and holds it over the nut; it pulls the nut off the magnet ball
moves a silver stick toward the magnet ball on the black base
the magnet ball is the only object on the black base
whispered
attempts to balence the silver stick in the center of the nut on the magnet ball
whispered
puts silver stick so that it is stuck to the side of the black base and touching the table
puts a silver man on the silver stick at the side of the base
